document_data.caption: Shoor Street on a circa. [[1492 DR]] map of the Trades Ward of Waterdeep
document_data.name: Shoor Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Shoor Street''' was a hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]] paved road in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: This road curved northwest out of [[Drover's Street]], crossed through the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]], and terminated on the northeastern end of [[Beacon Street]]. Along the way, it acted as the northern terminus of [[Blackmul Street]].
